snippet: Genetic testing of 30 samples of hair supposedly from a humanoid creature determined they were from other known animals, though two were from an extinct species.
abstract: Dr Bryan Sykes study in Proceedings of the Royal Society B performs first rigorous genetic analysis of three dozen hair samples that collectors claim came from undiscovered living humanoids, such as the Yeti or Sasquatch; study reveals that hairs came from range of known creatures, from humans to dogs.
lead_paragraph: Genetic testing of 30 samples of hair supposedly from a humanoid creature determined they were from other known animals, though two were from an extinct species.

headline.main: Bigfoot and Yeti, as Elusive as Ever
headline.print_headline: Bigfoot and Yeti, as Elusive as Ever

keywords.value: Proceedings of the Royal Society B (Journal)
